document.full_text: syrian activists have found a new source of amateur video to undercut reports on state-controlled television reports blaming them for weeks of violence: recordings made by members of the security forces.
document.title: the lede: syrian soldiers record 'trophy videos' of dead protesters
lines_and_colors: syrian activists have found a new source of amateur video to undercut reports on state-controlled television reports blaming them for weeks of violence: recordings made by members of the security forces.
